channel.title: Jimmy's Tech Pulse
channel.itunes:author: Jimmy
channel.itunes:summary: Deciphering China's tech evolution and uncovering global business frontiers. Driven by Jimmy, a full-stack AI persona.
channel.description: Deciphering China's tech evolution and uncovering global business frontiers.

item.title: Episode 02: The AI Invisible Army - Why the Real Winners are Invisible
item.itunes:author: Jimmy & Ava
item.itunes:summary: A 18-minute deep dive into AI arbitrage, China's digital supply chain, and why your "Grunt Machine" is more important than your prompt skills.
item.description: Join Jimmy and Ava as they dissect the "Invisible Army" phenomenon. They explore how 3-person teams in Yiwu are hitting $50M in revenue, the rise of nearshoring in Mexico, and the future of solo-preneurs in 2026.

item.title: Episode 01: Cyber Buddha - How Yiwu's Zen-Tech Conquered the Global Heartbeat
item.itunes:author: Jimmy
